custom-meta.meta-value: Because the dataset includes information about deaths, pregnant women, and serious cases of disease, it is not available in a public repository. The NCDC of Georgia releases some data publicly on their website ( http://ncdc.ge/Pages/User/News.aspx?ID=0bfb5084-0108-4b9a-9b96-4d796359f1be&language=en-US). Researchers can contact the NCDC at ncdc@ncdc.ge or episurv@ncdc.ge, or can contact the NCDC IRB at irb.ncdc@gmail.com to gain access to the data.
